attributes.action: We demand a national inquiry into the rape gang scandal to report
attributes.additional_details: The local inquiries, whilst useful, do not have the required powers to force attendance, or investigate the national implications of this issue. These operated on a national basis and the failure to accept the evidence of the victims and the failure from local and national politicians, police and others mean that a national inquiry is necessary
attributes.background: To set up an inquiry into the rape gang scandal. It is obvious that this is a national issue and that there was collusion and institutional cover ups at local and potentionally national level.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
